name: Wisp (MikyMoD, Catoblepa, Elettra, Jumbax)
description:
Wisp is a 2D platform about being a lost soul searching the meaning of life. You start with nothing... not even your body.

This game is created  for Ludum Dare 45.

Trailer Controls CommandKeyboardGamepadMoveW,A,S,DLeft StickJumpSpaceA button Devs

Programming: @MikyM0D

Art: @elettra_art, @Catoblepa5

Music & Sounds: @_Jumbax
